title: VW Example
description: A stream of examples sent to the VW web service, which will submit them to VW

items.description: An individual example in the stream

label.description: The label for the example. Can be null/empty, but can contain anything

tag.description: The tag for the example. Can be null/empty, but can contain anything

namespaces.description: The list of namespaces in the example

items.description: An individual namespace inside an example

name.description: The name of the namespace. Can be null/empty, but must not contain whitespace, | or :

scale.description: The scaling factor for the namespace, optional - defaults to 1 if not present - name must be present for this to be accepted

features.description: The list of features in this namespace

items.description: An individual feature inside a namespace

name.description: The name of the feature. Must be present

value.description: The value of the feature. Defaults to 1 if not present
